channel.title: About the Redbol category
channel.description:
Issues regarding compatibility and emulation of [Rebol2](http://www.rebol.com/docs/docs.html) and [Red](https://www.red-lang.org/p/about.html), as well as other things that would loosely be considered "Rebol-family" languages.
It's generally a goal that Ren-C be able to bend in order to do most anything that they can do...with modest effort. Pursuant to that goal is the [Redbol module](https://github.com/metaeducation/redbol/) to have an actual emulation of a reasonable compatible subset of the (non-GUI) portion of the languages.
More generally, this category is for discussing anything related to Rebol2 or Red semantics or features.
*Note: R3-Alpha emulation is considered uninteresting, as it never gained much traction. Most R3-Alpha codebases are either dead, [one of Oldes's projects](https://github.com/Oldes/Rebol3), or have been subsumed into Ren-C projects.*

item.title: About the Redbol category
item.dc:creator: hostilefork
